LEVEL UP YOUR CLUB

CLUBS ARE A LABOR OF LOVE, LET US HELP MAKE IT A LITTLE EASIER

PROGRAM OVERVIEW

Clubs can be a pain in the ass - whether it’s dealing with paperwork or motivating and recruiting members, without support after it can stop being fun and start feeling like work. We’ve been there and it sucks, so we started the EGF Champion program to offer our expertise and support to make things just a little less daunting.

We want to make your lives easier and your clubs better, so we provide:

ADVOCACY

We'll work with your administration to get your club the resources it needs on campus.

SUPPORT

We offer a variety of resources from sample constitutions to event support to keep things running smoothly.

LEGACY

We help ensure that after you graduate, the club you created keeps going.

GETTING ESPORTS ON CAMPUS STARTS WITH YOU

LET US HELP YOU START ONE ON YOUR CAMPUS. WE'LL BE IN TOUCH WITHIN A FEW DAYS TO SCHEDULE A MEETING WITH ONE OF OUR COMMUNITY MANAGERS TO START HELPING YOU ACHIEVE YOUR GOALS.

ALREADY A CLUB? LET'S GO VARSITY

IF YOUR CLUB IS ALREADY A WELL-OILED MACHINE AND LOOKING TO TAKE IT TO THE NEXT LEVEL, CONTACT US DIRECTLY TO LEARN MORE ABOUT HOW EGF BUILDS VARSITY ESPORTS PROGRAMS.
